data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Lyon's Leo Dubois breaks free at Groupama Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marseille have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Duje Caleta Car (Marseille) has received a yellow card from Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 5, Stephanie Frappart waits before resuming play because Tino Kadewere for Lyon is still down.
Lyon's Tino Kadewere looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 8, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Thiago Mendes for Lyon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Lyon's Houssem Aouar misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Marseille at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 12, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Leo Dubois of Lyon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
Stephanie Frappart awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Goal! Dimitri Payet gives Marseille a 0-1 lead in Lyon.
Florian Thauvin instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 17, Marseille will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Lyon.
At Groupama Stadium, Dimitri Payet is shown a red card and sent off.
Stephanie Frappart awards Marseille a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Marseille to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Marseille.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Tino Kadewere (Lyon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
An attacking Lyon player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Stephanie Frappart signals a throw-in for Lyon, close to Marseille's area.
In the minute 28, Houssem Aouar equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Marseille.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 29, Lyon's Thiago Mendes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Marseille defender.
Lyon pushes forward through Thiago Mendes, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Marseille.
In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Marseille in Lyon.
In the minute 32, Stephanie Frappart awards Lyon a goal kick.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 34, Marseille have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Stephanie Frappart signals a Lyon throw-in in Marseille's half.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 36, Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Goal kick for Marseille at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Marseille.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 40, Lyon attack but Tino Kadewere's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 41, Can Lyon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Marseille's half?
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 45, Lyon advance rapidly upfield but Stephanie Frappart blows for offside.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 45, Lyon's Jason Denayer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Marseille at Groupama Stadium.
Free kick Marseille.
Marseille’s Alvaro Gonzalez is on his feet again at Groupama Stadium.
Lyon are coming forward and Houssem Aouar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Marseille have a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Attention is being given to Marseille’s Alvaro Gonzalez and play has been suspended briefly.
Stephanie Frappart has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Stephanie Frappart signals a Lyon throw-in in Marseille's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
Marseille needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 47, Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart awards Marseille a goal kick.
Lyon's Tino Kadewere attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 52, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Can Marseille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lyon's half?
In the minute 56, In Lyon, Tino Kadewere (Lyon) misses the target with a header.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Maxence Caqueret (Lyon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 60, Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
Marseille needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a first substitution, with Pape Alassane Gueye replacing Boubacar Kamara.
Nemanja Radonjic is replacing Dario Benedetto for Marseille at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Lyon.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Thiago Mendes (Lyon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 65, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Lyon's Melvin Michel Maxence Bard is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 69, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Lyon make their first substitution with Bruno Guimaraes replacing Maxence Caqueret.
Memphis Depay is replacing Maxwel Cornet for the home team.
Stephanie Frappart awards Marseille a goal kick.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
In the minute 71, Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Marseille.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Lyon.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Marseille at Groupama Stadium.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 75, The away team replace Florian Thauvin with Maxime Lopez.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Tino Kadewere with Moussa Dembele. This is the third substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
So close for Lyon as Thiago Mendes's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Marseille in Lyon.
In the minute 81, Nemanja Radonjic is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Stephanie Frappart awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Nemanja Radonjic returns to the field for Marseille after picking up a slight injury.
Marcelo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Marcelo has recovered and rejoins the match in Lyon.
Lyon are pushing forward but Houssem Aouar's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Lyon.
Marcelo (Lyon) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Sinaly Diomande.
Rudi Garcia is making the team's fifth substitution at Groupama Stadium with Rayan Cherki replacing Karl Toko Ekambi.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 86, In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nemanja Radonjic for Marseille has been booked by Stephanie Frappart and receives a first yellow card.
Bruno Guimaraes (Lyon) has received a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Marseille's Valentin Rongier misses with an attempt on goal.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Goal kick for Marseille at Groupama Stadium.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Stephanie Frappart awards Lyon a goal kick.
Stephanie Frappart signals a Marseille throw-in in Lyon's half.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In Lyon Lyon attack through Memphis Depay. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
